comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss Audrey Ennis Moser received the OBE "for services to child welfare, especially child refugees, (Leigh Woods, Bristol)," in 1998: news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/special_report/1998/12/98/new_year_ho... See also: Jan Williamson and Audrey Moser, Unaccompanied Children in Emergencies: A Field Guide for their Care and Protection (International Social Service: Geneva 1988).
